name: Laser Squad: Expansion Kit Two
description:
This is the second expansion pack for Laser Squad offered via mail order (initial ZX Spectrum release by Target Games and C64 & Amstrad CPC cassette tape releases by Blade Software had only three missions, with mail order option for two more, later releases and ports featured all five).

It includes two new scenarios:
  • 6: The Stardrive - retrieve the stardrive controller, taken from a new rebel fighter, from a group of mercenaries in their hidden base
  • 7: Laser Platoon - encounter on a symmetrical map between matching 10-man teams
...and new weapons.
